description: Deletes an asset. This action can't be undone. For more information, see Deleting assets and models in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: The ID of the asset to delete. This can be either the actual ID in UUID format, or else externalId: followed by the external ID, if it has one. For more information, see Referencing objects with external IDs in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique case-sensitive identifier that you can provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. Don't reuse this client token if a new idempotent request is required. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: assetStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the asset, which contains a state ( DELETING after successfully calling this operation) and any error message.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current status of the asset.
